events.message: I just received the laptop I ordered last week and unfortunately the screen is scratched and displays lines all over it.
The system has classified this case under Product Defect due to the customer's description of the scratched and faulty screen.
The case has been assigned to agent Rachel M., who specializes in defective product issues.
Hello! I’m Rachel from customer support. I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your laptop screen, and I’m here to help you resolve it as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratched screen and any visible damage, as well as confirm whether the laptop was damaged during shipping?
I have attached photos showing the scratches and the screen lines. The box didn’t show any signs of damage, so I think it arrived faulty from the factory.
Thank you for the images. We can offer to replace your laptop free of charge or provide a full refund. Please let me know which option you prefer.
I would prefer the replacement as I really need the laptop for work. Thank you for offering a solution so quickly!
We have arranged shipment for a replacement laptop. You will receive tracking information shortly, and a prepaid label will come with the package for returning the defective item.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the replacement laptop and that it is working properly. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Since no further issues were reported, we are closing your case. Thank you for contacting customer support and have a great day!
